description: AR-01 is the primary Regional Transport Office for Itanagar, the capital city of Arunachal Pradesh. It manages all transport-related services including vehicle registration, driving licenses, and permit issuance for the capital region. The office serves as a critical hub for the state's administrative and transport infrastructure.
address: District Transport Office, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Capital Complex, Itanagar (Naharlagun), Papum Pare District, Arunachal Pradesh
